entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
